text: o visvasulara! Visvasincina strilu, mi vaddaku valasa vaccinapudu, varini pariksincandi. Allah ku vari visvasam gurinci baga telusu. Varu vastavanga visvasincina varani miku telisinappudu, varini satyatiraskarula vaddaku tirigi pampakandi. (Endukante) a strilu variki (satyatiraskarulaku) dharmasam'matamaina (bharyalu) karu mariyu varu kuda a strilaku dharmasam'matamaina (bhartalu) karu. Kani, varu (satyatiraskarulu), varikiccina (mahr) miru variki cellincandi mariyu variki vari mahr iccina taruvata, a strilanu vivahamadite miku elanti dosam ledu. Mariyu miru kuda satyatiraskarulaina strilanu mi vivahabandhanlo uncukokandi. (Avisvasuluga undi podalacina) mi bharyala nundi miru iccina mahar adigi tisukondi. (Alage avisvasulanu, visvasulaina tama) bharyala nundi mahr adigi tisukonivvandi. Idi allah tirmanam. Ayana i vidhanga mi madhya tirpu cestunnadu. Mariyu allah sarvajnudu, maha vivecanaparudu
